title: For the love of type, please help me!
content:
Ok I just moved to a really expensive part of town and I'm having trouble paying all these bills (where are they coming from and didn't I already pay that one last month??). I am employed full time and yet, they aren't paying enough. I really love my company and don't feel that leaving is an option just to pay the bills (I'd rather like who I work with).

So I'm asking anyone who has any freelance opportunities, please look at my portfolio, [www.studio513.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020203709/http:/www.studio513.net/ "www.studio513.net") and contact me if I can help. I really really really really really really need the work. My specialties are but not limited to publication layout and logos. Thanks!

Kim :)

P.S. I'm located in Maryland but can work via email or phone for instructions.
author: Datura513
